SpecialChars
click mkfile_button_icon
type filename é.txt
click //div[@id='generic_dialog_box']/div/form/div[@class='dialogButtons']/input[@name='sub']
assertElementPresent //table[@id='selectable_div']/tbody/tr[@text='é.txt']
click delete_button_icon
click //div[@id='generic_dialog_box']/div/form/div[@class='dialogButtons']/input[@name='sub']
assertElementNotPresent //table[@id='selectable_div']/tbody/tr[@text='é.txt']
click mkfile_button_icon
type filename $.txt
click //div[@id='generic_dialog_box']/div/form/div[@class='dialogButtons']/input[@name='sub']
assertElementPresent //table[@id='selectable_div']/tbody/tr[@text='$.txt']
click delete_button_icon
click //div[@id='generic_dialog_box']/div/form/div[@class='dialogButtons']/input[@name='sub']
assertElementNotPresent //table[@id='selectable_div']/tbody/tr[@text='$.txt']
click mkfile_button_icon
type filename &.txt
click //div[@id='generic_dialog_box']/div/form/div[@class='dialogButtons']/input[@name='sub']
assertElementPresent //table[@id='selectable_div']/tbody/tr[@text='&.txt']
click delete_button_icon
click //div[@id='generic_dialog_box']/div/form/div[@class='dialogButtons']/input[@name='sub']
assertElementNotPresent //table[@id='selectable_div']/tbody/tr[@text='&.txt']
click mkfile_button_icon
type filename Qu'ote.txt
click //div[@id='generic_dialog_box']/div/form/div[@class='dialogButtons']/input[@name='sub']
assertElementPresent //table[@id='selectable_div']/tbody/tr[@text="Qu'ote.txt"]
click delete_button_icon
click //div[@id='generic_dialog_box']/div/form/div[@class='dialogButtons']/input[@name='sub']
assertElementNotPresent //table[@id='selectable_div']/tbody/tr[@text="Qu'ote.txt.txt"]
